txt.en: This ox was slain by some predator and left to rot, but there is some meat on the carcass that has not yet spoiled. Perhaps it would be a great kindness to collect more meat from the wild oxen to help feed the oppressed inhabitants of Barnavon....
'I am moved, [placeholder], that you would think of the People of the Boar when my own people consider them naught more than thralls.\n\n'I will see this meat delivered to the poor families.'
'Have you found any evidence regarding the origins of the Warg-riders?'
You found the carcass of a wild ox slain by some predator and left to rot; however, you were able to procure a small portion of edible meat from the corpse.
Dun Oxen can be found throughout Carreglyn.\n\nYou should hunt the wild oxen for meat to bring to the oppressed inhabitants of Barnavon.
Bring the ox-meat to Gwilum in Barnavon
Gwilum is at the gate to Lower Barnavon.\n\nYou should bring the meat you collected to Gwilum for distribution.
